RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Doutor em Sensoriamento Remoto - INPE Mestrado: Silvicultura (Patologia Florestal) - UFPR (2009 - 2011) Graduao: Engenharia Florestal - UFPR (2010) Conhecimento: Processamento de dados Landsat-like Estimativa de rea agrcola via dados orbitais em nvel macrorregional Gentica e Melhoramento Florestal Patologia Florestal
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: graduation at Engenharia Florestal from Universidade Federal do Paran (2010), master's at Forest Resources and Forest Engineering from Universidade Federal do Paran (2011) and doctorate at Geosciences from Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas Espaciais (2016). Has experience in Geosciences, acting on the following subjects: eucalyptus benthamii, minijardim clonal, fitopatologia, eucalyptus dunnii and pinus radiata.

OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES: - Participao de projeto formado pela Singenta, Confloresta e Embrapa para controle qumico de Puccinia psidii em plantios clonais de Eucalyptus spp. - Participao do projeto de Reintroduo do Pinus radiata no Brasil.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Silvicultura e melhoramento de espcies florestais
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Esta linha de pesquisa trata de estudos de produo de sementes, nutrio florestal, melhoramento florestal, gentica quantitativa em melhoramento florestal. Trata tambm da proteo, controle de pragas e doenas florestais.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Desenvolvimento e implementao de um sistema de monitoramento agrcola para o Brasil, via dados de satlites de observao da Terra
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: The main aim of the proposed project is to develop, test and implement an agricultural monitoring system which is mainly based on freely available coarse/medium resolution MODIS images. The system also integrates high resolution Earth Observation (EO) imagery (e.g. Landsat, ASTER and CBERS), agro-statistics and meteorological data sets. The system is designed for deriving within-season yield and crop area information as well as information regarding vegetation vigor, (drought) stress, phenology and disturbances (e.g. permanent changes of land cover). Such an agricultural monitoring system adapted to Brazilian conditions is needed as global agriculture will have to double its production within the next 40 years, while minimizing environmental impacts. This transition needs to be closely monitored. The Brazilian agriculture is internationally recognized as one of the most important for achieving an increased agricultural production. Its particular positions stems from its very large cropland area, the still significant yield gap and the large amount of cropland devoted to the production of non-food crops (e.g. for feeding animals and biofuel). For monitoring the Brazilian agricultural production in an unbiased and objective manner, readily available remotely sensed data has to be analyzed in a semi-automatic fashion for yielding important information for all kind of policy makers and stakeholders. The project aims implementing a demonstrator of such a system for the States of Sao Paulo, Parana, Santa Catarina and Rio Grande do Sul. The system will be tested under operational conditions in the 2014/2015 growing season. The MODIS image archive will also be processed backwards to 2000, for illustrating the pathway which led to the current status.

DETALHAMENTO-DE-OUTRAS-PARTICIPACOES-EM-.NOME-DO-EVENTO: Noes de colheita floresta (Toras curtas) - Aracruz ES

DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-PARTICIPACOES-EM.TITULO: Colheita Florestal com uso de Harvester e Forwarder (Jonh deer)

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-ORIENTACAO-EM-ANDAMENTO.NATUREZA: Trabalho de concluso de curso de graduao
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-ORIENTACAO-EM-ANDAMENTO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Levantamento de doenas em Ilex paraguarienis na FLONA de Trs Barras

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Este trabalho est sendo desenvolvido por Eriverton da Silva, juntamente com o ICMBio, com intuito de levantar as principais doenas na eva-mate.
